content: round 1 4sc in magic_ring 4 front picture of the snout for reference round 2 increase x 4 8 round 3 single_crochet 2hdc 2sc 2hdc single_crochet 8 slip_stitch into the first stitch of the next round fasten_off and leave a long tail for sewing pattern for the horns make 2 the horns will be made in colour b yarn round 1 4sc in magic_ring 4 round 2 increase single_crochet x 2 6 fasten_off and leave a long tail for sewing pattern for the ears make 2 the ears will be made in colour a yarn round 1 4sc in magic_ring 4 round 2 increase x 4 8 round 3 single_crochet around 8 round 4 decrease x 4 4 fasten_off and leave a long tail for sewing pattern pattern for the small spot make 2 the spots will be made in colour b yarn round 1 6sc in magic_ring 6 round 2 increase x 6 12 slip_stitch into the first stitch of the next round fasten_off and leave a long tail for sewing pattern for the large spot the spot will be made in colour b yarn round 1 6sc in magic_ring 6 round 2 increase x 6 12 round 3 increase single_crochet x 6 18 slip_stitch into the first stitch of the next round fasten_off and leave a long tail for sewing pattern for the tail the tail will start in colour a yarn chain 8 then switch to colour b yarn half_double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet into 2nd chain from hook switch back to colour a yarn and single_crochet along the chain to the end fasten_off and leave long tail for sewing assembly with all the pieces of the cow made we can now sew it all together as there are many pieces to the toy i recommend pinning a few pieces at a time to make the sewing process easier pin the head to the body on the end where we started the body make sure it looks even before sewing it on pin all the legs on to make sure there s enough space for all of them to fit on once you re happy with the placement sew the legs on you may have to take the other legs off while you sew one on to make it easier next you can pin and sew on the ears horns and snout for the spots you can position them where ever you like but i placed the large one on the back and the two small ones on each side assembly now we have attached the head snout ears horns legs and spots attaching the tail is simple pin it to the top of the butt as indicated in the picture below the final step for making this cow is to shape the head this step is optional but recommended as i think it makes it look extra cute shaping the head involves making the eyes more sunken in to give shape to the face with a long piece
